ul.li: Define a abstraction: use many places in program -> often apply OOP

li.span: Contain business logic -> does not change across many different apps

div.span:
Reduce dependecy with DI: (dependency inversion)

div.style: text-align: left;

li.span: Business like a heart of app, less changes
We can support many data access types, use the same business
We can change data access when change needs
